Watching TV



Due to rain and wind we decamped to a hotel for the night. The Rychnovsky's and Huntly-Fenners' got connecting suites; the kids watched TV in one room while the rest of us chatted and drank wine in the other.
Taken Saturday, March 15, 2003, 05:26:05pm.  Original image size: 3072x2048, 6.7Mb
Technical details: Canon EOS D60, 1/30s @ F2.8, ISO 800, 15mm/F2.8 (24mm equiv)
PS7 CRW 2600:20, 0:0:70:70:0:25:35+M
